GAMEPLAY_CupNoodlesDescription.English: Instant noodles are prepared by adding boiling water to the container, but you can also eat it without boiling. Don't put this on fire.
GAMEPLAY_CupNoodlesDescription.Japanese: カップラーメンは容器にお湯を注いで作りますが、茹でずに食べることもできます。火にかけないで下さい！

GAMEPLAY_CupNoodlesOpen.Japanese: カップラーメン (調理済み)

GAMEPLAY_CupNoodlesOpenDescription.English: Instant noodles are prepared by adding boiling water to the container, but you can also eat it without boiling. Don't put this on fire.
GAMEPLAY_CupNoodlesOpenDescription.Japanese: カップラーメンは容器にお湯を注いで作りますが、茹でずに食べることもできます。火にかけないで下さい！

GAMEPLAY_SoyRamen.Japanese: インスタントラーメン

GAMEPLAY_SoyRamenDescription.English: All you need for instant noodles is a pot of boiling water, but you can also eat it without boiling. Even vegetarians can enjoy Soy Sauce flavors.
GAMEPLAY_SoyRamenDescription.Japanese: インスタントラーメンは鍋とお湯さえあれば調理できますが、茹でずに食べることもできます。ベジタリアンも楽しめる醤油味。

GAMEPLAY_SoyRamenCooked.Japanese: インスタントラーメン (調理済み)

GAMEPLAY_SoyRamenCookedDescription.English: All you need for instant noodles is a pot of boiling water, but you can also eat it without boiling. Even vegetarians can enjoy Soy Sauce flavors.
GAMEPLAY_SoyRamenCookedDescription.Japanese: インスタントラーメンは鍋とお湯さえあれば調理できますが、茹でずに食べることもできます。ベジタリアンも楽しめる醤油味。
